0.1.name: wordpress/yahoo-messenger-status-plugin
0.1.description: This plugin allows you to adds a widget to display current Yahoo Messenger online status. It gives you the option on using the available status images from the Yahoo! Messenger webservice, as well as the ability to put in your own custom images. You can also set what clicking on the widget does (sends you an IM, adds you as a contact, or calls you over Yahoo! Messenger voice).
